member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_TARGET_DEVICE_NAME
member.summary: The DISPLAYCONFIG_TARGET_DEVICE_NAME structure contains information about the target.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_TARGET_DEVICE_NAME.header
member.summary: A structure that contains information about the request for the target device name. The caller should set the type member of DISPLAYCONFIG_DEVICE_INFO_HEADER to DISPLAYCONFIG_DEVICE_INFO_GET_TARGET_NAME and the adapterId and id members of DISPLAYCONFIG_DEVICE_INFO_HEADER to the target for which the caller wants the target device name. The caller should set the size member of DISPLAYCONFIG_DEVICE_INFO_HEADER to at least the size of the DISPLAYCONFIG_TARGET_DEVICE_NAME structure.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_TARGET_DEVICE_NAME.flags
member.summary: A structure that identifies, in bit-field flags, information about the target.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_TARGET_DEVICE_NAME.outputTechnology
member.summary: A value from the enumeration that specifies the target's connector type.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_TARGET_DEVICE_NAME.edidManufactureId
member.summary: The manufacture identifier from the monitor extended display identification data (EDID). This member is set only when the edidIdsValid bit-field is set in the flags member.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_TARGET_DEVICE_NAME.edidProductCodeId
member.summary: The product code from the monitor EDID. This member is set only when the edidIdsValid bit-field is set in the flags member.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_TARGET_DEVICE_NAME.connectorInstance
member.summary: The one-based instance number of this particular target only when the adapter has multiple targets of this type. The connector instance is a consecutive one-based number that is unique within each adapter. If this is the only target of this type on the adapter, this value is zero.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_TARGET_DEVICE_NAME.monitorFriendlyDeviceName
member.summary: A NULL-terminated WCHAR string that is the device name for the monitor. This name can be used with SetupAPI.dll to obtain the device name that is contained in the installation package.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_TARGET_DEVICE_NAME.monitorDevicePath
member.summary: A NULL-terminated WCHAR string that is the path to the device name for the monitor. This path can be used with SetupAPI.dll to obtain the device name that is contained in the installation package.
